00028 #ifndef __StaticFaceGroup_H__
00029 #define __StaticFaceGroup_H__

00033 #include "OgrePlane.h"
00034 #include "OgrePatchSurface.h"

00036 namespace Ogre {
00037 
00045     enum FaceGroupType {
00046         FGT_FACE_LIST,
00047         FGT_PATCH,
00048         FGT_UNKNOWN
00049     };
00050 
00069     struct StaticFaceGroup {
00070         // Type of face group.
00071         FaceGroupType fType;
00072 
00074         bool isSky;
00075 
00079         int vertexStart;
00080 
00085         int numVertices;
00086 
00094         int elementStart;
00095 
00099         int numElements;
00100 
00105         int materialHandle;
00106 
00107         Plane plane;
00108 
00110         PatchSurface* patchSurf;
00111 
00112 
00113         _OgreExport friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const StaticFaceGroup& s)
00114         {
00115             o << "StaticFaceGroup(";
00116             if (s.fType == FGT_FACE_LIST)
00117             {
00118                 o << "faceList, numVertices=" << s.numVertices << ", vertexStart=" << s.vertexStart;
00119                 o << ", numElements=" << s.numElements << ", elementStart=" << s.elementStart;
00120                 o << ", normal=" << s.plane.normal;
00121             }
00122             else if (s.fType == FGT_PATCH)
00123             {
00124                 o << "bezierPatch, numVertices=" << s.numVertices << ", vertexStart=" << s.vertexStart;
00125                 // TODO
00126             }
00127 
00128             o << ", materialHandle=" << s.materialHandle;
00129             o << ")";
00130 
00131             return o;
00132         }
00133 
00134 
00135     };
00139 } // namespace
00140 
00141 #endif
